title: Matth58
author: Matth58
content: ASH token is swapping on pancakeswap. It's pretty evenly distributed between 1600 wallets and growing. Great concept to attract and hold investors. Tokens hold voting rights to which environmental project to find from its liquidity pool. Check out there website ashtoken.io In the last 3 months it's had a steady growth of over 300%

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Matth58 on April 08, 2023, 10:08:34 PMASH token is swapping on pancakeswap. It's pretty evenly distributed between 1600 wallets and growing. Great concept to attract and hold investors. Tokens hold voting rights to which environmental project to find from its liquidity pool. Check out there website ashtoken.io In the last 3 months it's had a steady growth of over 300%I'm not familiar with that token, why did it airdrop with pancakeswap? I was curious to know that and I realized that it is not a good investment in my opinion.I saw in CMC that his market volume is only 1650$ in 24hrs where the price of each coin is 0.8$, it's obvious that it's just hyped and there are no investors who are mostly here because they don't have a good development seen here in the ash token you speak of.https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/ash/
